MODULE.name: AUDPROC_MODULE_ID_DELAY
MODULE.description:
ID of the Delay/Latency module on the LPCM data path.
This module#[ #] introduces the specified amount of delay in the audio path.
If the delay is increased, silence is inserted. If the delay is decreased, data is#[ #] dropped.
There are no smooth transitions.The resolution of the delay applied is limited by the period of a single sample. Qualcomm recommends muting#[ #] the device path when the delay is changed (to avoid glitches).
This module supports the AUDPROC_PARAM_ID_DELAY parameter ID.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: delay_us
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description:
Delay in microseconds.
The amount of delay must be greater than 0.
 If the value is zero, this module is disabled.
The actual#[ #] resolution of the delay is limited by the period of a single audio sample.
